Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: Why do we kill people who are killing people to show that killing people is wrong?

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: I love a great conspiracy story. Who doesn't?

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: A sympathetic friend can be quite as dear as a brother

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: My confidence comes from the daily grind - training my butt off day in and day out

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: A picture is a poem without words

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: The illusion that times that were are better than those that are, has probably pervaded all ages

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Seek not greatness, but seek truth and you will find both

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: This world is a comedy to those that think, a tragedy to those that feel

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Treat every Frenchman as if he was the devil himself

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just deeply disappointed that once again we may have to settle for the lesser of two evils

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: We shouldn't be too hard on vanity. It can be a mark of respect for the world

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: Any virtual community that works, works because people put in some time

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't imagine a day without coffee. I can't imagine!

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no treat being in bed with me

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: My point of reference is life, in everything that I do

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like false happy endings, and I don't think the real world is such a forgiving place

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I know my choices will be creative so long as I follow my heart

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: My fear was not of death itself, but a death without meaning

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: A free press is the cornerstone of democracy; there is no question about that

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good to be selfish. But not so self-centered that you never listen to other people

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, the smell of fresh-made coffee is one of the greatest inventions

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a coffee fanatic. Once you go to proper coffee, you can't go back. You cannot go back

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: Mutual respect! That's what it takes to be friends

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole world is about three drinks behind

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am blessed beyond belief

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Swallow your pride and admit that we all need help at times

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not underestimate the determination of a quiet man

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: My first priority is to my wife, as hers is to me, and to our child

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Older women are best, because they always think they may be doing it for the last time

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything in Russia is made of cement - phone booths, fence posts and light bulbs

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: In every generation, there are quite firm rules on how to behave when you are crazy

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: We tend to think about fascism in terms of the Second World War

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an intimate sort of child who never spoke up in groups. I preferred close friends

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Macbeth' was a very lucky play for me

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't particularly want to stay close to your ex-wife. Or why would she be your ex-wife?

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to have a dream... if you don't have any big dreams, nothing happens

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a million acquaintances but just two or three true friends. I can't hide anything from them

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to see more women working as directors and producers

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to originate new roles and characters for musical theater

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: Not obsessed with particularly Nike, but sneakers in general. I love them

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd known since about eleven that I wanted to live in America

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: What did Christ really do? He hung out with hard-drinking fishermen

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: Improvising things is always changing. A lot of momentum

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I know as I'm taking my dying breath, the ambulance guy will ask me why they cancelled Action

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: Eliminating the things you love is not wellness. Wellness feeds your soul and makes you feel good

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see why women have to get naked to sell an album. It's crazy

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only do your best. That's all you can do. And if it isn't good enough, it isn't good enough

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people say to me, Isn't it too bad that people discovered you so late? I never thought that

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: San Francisco, coolest place ever

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: The team which handles the pressure best, carries the day

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: When you write a story, it just flows and you don't control it. It's subconscious

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to do everything from scratch. Nobody wants to make puff pastry!

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: I write scripts to serve as skeletons awaiting the flesh and sinew of images

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I never say no to an ice cream

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people have culturally induced ethical blindness, but they can be cured!

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: Intimacy is something to be cherished, and intimacy is not something to be afraid of

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no question that consumers are looking for value today

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: Great personal style is an extreme curiosity about yourself

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: In philosophy if you aren't moving at a snail's pace you aren't moving at all

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Parsi theater was known for melodrama

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy the freedom of the blank page

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: A writer has to live with a sense of honor

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: I found 'Celebrity Gangster' intense, dramatic, a real page turner

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The wisdom of the wise, and the experience of ages, may be preserved by quotation

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: But anyone who knows anything about the music industry knows it's not only about the music

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: If you enjoy the fragrance of a rose, you must accept the thorns which it bears

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: Auschwitz will forever remain the black hole of the entire human history

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone asks, Will he make it, will she make it? You never make it

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no point in dwelling on rejection

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of myself as pretty. I am what I am

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: If we are completely honest with ourselves, everyone has a dark side to their personalities

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no fear of being less beautiful, I've always been afraid of not being beautiful

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have the athletic ability, why waste it in one sport?

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: My greatest gift that I have in life is basketball

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there is nothing sexier than a handlebar moustache

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: You write a play mostly out of yourself. There's a need to get a certain thing down

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose - where I start - is the idea of use. It is not recycling, it's reuse

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: I suffer from everyday life

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: That makes classical music work, the ability to improvise

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You're doing a major merger, you got to hope you didn't get it wrong. That's the view of any CEO

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: If I don't practice the way I should, then I won't play the way that I know I can

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: Also watching a movie on DVD is different than watching it in the theater

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: We sit in the mud... and reach for the stars

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Looking good is the best revenge

Quote.Author: Ivica Dacic
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no private life, as I am constantly under police surveillance

Quote.Author: Ivor Novello
Quote.QuoteValue: Love-making is an art which must be studied

Quote.Author: Izaak Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Good company in a journey makes the way seem shorter

Quote.Author: Izabella Scorupco
Quote.QuoteValue: The most simple things can bring the most happiness

Quote.Author: J. B. Priestley
Quote.QuoteValue: To different minds, the same world is a hell, and a heaven

Quote.Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Its really hard to be roommates with people if your suitcases are much better than theirs

Quote.Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote.QuoteValue: The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights

Quote.Author: J. R. R. Tolkien
Quote.QuoteValue: Still round the corner there may wait, A new road or a secret gate

Quote.Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
Quote.QuoteValue: I am become death, the destroyer of worlds

Quote.Author: Ja Rule
Quote.QuoteValue: I got started in 1995, working in a group called The Cash Money Click

Quote.Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote.QuoteValue: I had nothing to offer anybody except my own confusion

Quote.Author: Jack Kevorkian
Quote.QuoteValue: My ultimate aim is to make euthanasia a positive experience

Quote.Author: Jack London
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club

Quote.Author: Jack Ma
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine

Quote.Author: Jack Nicholson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend

Quote.Author: Jack Nicklaus
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, the biggest rival I had in my career was me

Quote.Author: Jack Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Control your own destiny or someone else will

Quote.Author: Jackie Chan
Quote.QuoteValue: Coffee is a language in itself

Quote.Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship

Quote.Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Above anything else, I hate to lose

Quote.Author: Jackson Pollock
Quote.QuoteValue: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is

Quote.Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote.QuoteValue: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever

Quote.Author: Jada Pinkett Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: My belief is that communication is the best way to create strong relationships

Quote.Author: James Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Circumstances do not make the man, they reveal him

Quote.Author: James Altucher
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is the fastest way to prevent a mistake from turning into a failure

Quote.Author: James Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I just thank God for all of the blessings

Quote.Author: James Cash Penney
Quote.QuoteValue: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together

Quote.Author: James Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today

Quote.Author: James Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: As an engineer I'm constantly spotting problems and plotting how to solve them

Quote.Author: James Earl Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: More and more, when I single out the person out who inspired me most, I go back to my grandfather

Quote.Author: James Hetfield
Quote.QuoteValue: There is one Metallica. We have many styles, it's called Metallica

Quote.Author: James Hillman
Quote.QuoteValue: It is impossible to see the angel unless you first have a notion of it

Quote.Author: James Joyce
Quote.QuoteValue: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts

Quote.Author: James M. Barrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who bring sunshine into the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves

Quote.Author: James Madison
Quote.QuoteValue: If Tyranny and Oppression come to this land, it will be in the guise of fighting a foreign enemy

Quote.Author: James Mattis
Quote.QuoteValue: For a sitting U.S. president to see our allies as freeloaders is nuts

Quote.Author: James Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of life is enjoying the passage of time

Quote.Author: James Thurber
Quote.QuoteValue: A drawing is always dragged down to the level of its caption

Quote.Author: Jamie Dimon
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can forecast the economy with certainty

Quote.Author: Jamie Farr
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what's nice about Montreal? Not only is it a beautiful city, but you have Cuban cigars

Quote.Author: Jamie Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: Stop being a vegan and start enjoying what you eat

Quote.Author: Jamie Wyeth
Quote.QuoteValue: The real kiss of death - particularly with my father - is the extraordinary popularity of his work

Quote.Author: Jane Fonda
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a confidence about my life that comes from standing tall on my own two feet

Quote.Author: Janis Joplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh Lord, won't you buy me a Mercedes Benz

Quote.Author: Jason Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: We're going to turn this team around 360 degrees

Quote.Author: Jason Statham
Quote.QuoteValue: I've come from nowhere, and I'm not shy to go back

Quote.Author: Jasper Carrott
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is the best medicine - unless you're diabetic, then insulin comes pretty high on the list

Quote.Author: Jasper Johns
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not strong on perfection

Quote.Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of a people is a true mirror to their minds

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: Out of difficulties grow miracles

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: The more sand that has escaped from the hourglass of our life, the clearer we should see through it

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really need to be remembered. I hope the music's remembered

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Did you know babies are nauseated by the smell of a clean shirt?

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: You pay a price when you have an objective sentencing system. That is, nothing is perfect

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: Life can be dramatic and funny all in the same day

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: Women should never go without earrings. Passing on them is an opportunity missed

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: The power of the lawyer is in the uncertainty of the law

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not doing celebrity, personality, abusive politics - we are doing ideas. This is about hope

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: I honestly believe that advertising is the most fun you can have with your clothes on

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Constantly choosing the lesser of two evils is still choosing evil

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Pay attention, don't let life go by you. Fall in love with the back of your cereal box

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Gemini. Know what that means? There are two very different sides to me

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: Congratulations, you have a sense of humor. And to those who didn't: Go stick your head in the mud

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: All I have to say is: Jessica Simpson is the most beautiful woman on the planet!

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, hair is an accoutrement. Hair is jewelry. It's an accessory

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: Life has a way of working out the way it's meant to

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a comedian, which is the opposite of a lifestyle that equips you to be a parent

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be unhappy in the middle of a big, beautiful river

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself

Quote.Author: Jim Valvano
Quote.QuoteValue: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me

Quote.Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote.QuoteValue: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace

Quote.Author: Jimmy Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been

Quote.Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I say to you quite frankly that the time for racial discrimination is over

Quote.Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination

Quote.Author: Jimmy Fallon
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Have fun' is my message. Be silly. You're allowed to be silly. There's nothing wrong with it

Quote.Author: Jimmy Page
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just looking for an angel with a broken wing

Quote.Author: Jo Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate

Quote.Author: Joan Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: Loneliness is the universal problem of rich people

Quote.Author: Joan Didion
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always wanted a swimming pool and never had one

Quote.Author: Joan Rivers
Quote.QuoteValue: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present

Quote.Author: Joanna Lumley
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never felt the constraints of social acceptability

Quote.Author: Joe Biden
Quote.QuoteValue: Fighting corruption is not just good governance. It's self-defense. It's patriotism

Quote.Author: Joe Paterno
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things

Quote.Author: Joe Rogan
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can lie, you can act, and if you can lie to crazy girlfriends, you can act under pressure

Quote.Author: Joel Salatin
Quote.QuoteValue: Know you food, know your farmers, and know your kitchen

Quote.Author: John Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I must study politics and war that my sons may have liberty to study mathematics and philosophy

Quote.Author: John Bolton
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't given up on the possibility that sweet reason will prevail

Quote.Author: John Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you can do it, you can

Quote.Author: John Cena
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't doll myself up for TV because I want people to accept me for who I am

Quote.Author: John Cleese
Quote.QuoteValue: The most creative people have this childlike facility to play

Quote.Author: John Cornyn
Quote.QuoteValue: In my experience, endorsements by public officials, they don't count for anything

Quote.Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote.QuoteValue: If your only goal is to become rich, you will never achieve it

Quote.Author: John Dewey
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself

Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: We first make our habits, and then our habits make us

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as trying to analyze all the attention I received, I will leave that to others

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: What a director should be doing is making it appear as though there was no script

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: Under capitalism, man exploits man. Under communism, it's just the opposite

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: The art challenges the technology, and the technology inspires the art

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: I played classical as a kid

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up. Never give in. Never become hostile... Hate is too big a burden to bear

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: Education begins the gentleman, but reading, good company and reflection must finish him

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: I like crazy people, especially those who don't see the risk

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: I like design, I like details, to me it is just another form of self-expression

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: They say stay in the lines, but there's always something better on the other side

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: Ideas shape the course of history

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just a thorn in everybody's side

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody loves success, but they hate successful people

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind is its own place and in itself, can make a Heaven of Hell, a Hell of Heaven

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pretty physically unsettling, living life on a visa

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: God tests His people through hardship

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: Mountains are the beginning and the end of all natural scenery

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a child of the 21st century

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: One can find so many pains when the rain is falling

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: Money will determine whether the accused goes to prison or walks out of the courtroom a free man

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the thing to do is enjoy the ride while you're on it

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew my beard out a little bit just to show that, indeed, I am a man

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a vintage which comes with age and experience

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: The best ideas start as conversations

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: No great achiever - even those who made it seem easy - ever succeeded without hard work

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I see music as fluid architecture

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: A genuine man goes to the roots. To be a radical is no more than that: to go to the roots

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is a game about feelings and intelligence

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Some memories are unforgettable, remaining ever vivid and heartwarming!

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Venice is eternity itself

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing more enticing, disenchanting, and enslaving than the life at sea

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The aim of argument, or of discussion, should not be victory, but progress

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: One day in God's grace is equivalent to a thousand days of striving by your own efforts

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is the solution to all problems. No man - no problem

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wanna be famous, then it's okay if the music is fake, because fame isn't real

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Absolutely eat dessert first. The thing that you want to do the most, do that

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: In love there are two things - bodies and words

Quote.Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting

Quote.Author: Judah Friedlander
Quote.QuoteValue: Valentine's Day is definitely one of those days where it's either awesome or it's a downer

Quote.Author: Judy Blume
Quote.QuoteValue: We're supposed to be uncomfortable when we read something. That's how we learn

Quote.Author: Jules Verne
Quote.QuoteValue: The sea is only the embodiment of a supernatural and wonderful existence

Quote.Author: Julie Andrews
Quote.QuoteValue: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th

Quote.Author: Julie Burchill
Quote.QuoteValue: It has been said that a pretty face is a passport. But it's not, it's a visa, and it runs out fast

Quote.Author: Julius Caesar
Quote.QuoteValue: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it

Quote.Author: Junot Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I look most like myself... when I'm wearing my black, nerdy engineering glasses

Quote.Author: Justin Bieber
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends are the best to turn to when you're having a rough day

Quote.Author: Justin Timberlake
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent doesn't always equal success

Quote.Author: Justin Trudeau
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada has always been there to help people who need it
